uk.ac.liv.csc.semanticweblab.modtool.modularisation
Class OntologyValidator

java.lang.Object
  uk.ac.liv.csc.semanticweblab.modtool.modularisation.OntologyValidator

public class OntologyValidator
extends java.lang.Object

Takes an ontology file as input and checks that it is clean and valid. It uses the Pellet reasoner to perform these functions. The code from this class was adapted from the JenaReasoner.java example provided with the Pellet distribution.

Author:
Paul Doran
